message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $140.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm really interested in the product, but $140 is a bit higher than my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $130?
I understand you're on a budget, Bob! I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I can offer it to you for $137.50
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice.  $137.50 is still a bit high for me. How about $135? That would be a fair price for both of us.
I'm glad we're getting close, Bob! I can do $138, but that's as low as I can go. It's a great deal for you, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
Alice, I'm really trying to make this work, but $138 is still a little too high for me.  Would you consider $136? I'm sure you'll still make a good profit on the sale.
I'm starting to think we're getting close to the sweet spot, Bob! I can meet you at $137, but that's the last concession I can make. After that, I'll have to consider other options.
